controllers

Class AlbumViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.AlbumViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogoutEvent

    public class AlbumViewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements LogoutEvent
    This class controls the album view represented by albumview.fxml. Displays information in a tableview representing all photos in the specified album. Implements LogoutEvent.
    Author:
    Derek Schatel

      • handleOpenButton

        private void handleOpenButton(javafx.stage.Stage mainstage)
        Handles opening the selected photo from the list into a Photo View.
        Parameters:
        mainstage - the main stage

      • handleAddButton

        private void handleAddButton()
        Adds a new photo to this album. Pops up a FileChooser dialog that allows the user to select either a JPG or PNG file. The method then checks the photo globally against all other photos in all user albums to avoid unnecessary duplication.

      • handleDeleteButton

        private void handleDeleteButton()
        Prompts the user with a dialog box to confirm deletion of the selected photo. If confirmed, deleted the selected photo from the album.

      • handleSlideshowButton

        private void handleSlideshowButton(javafx.stage.Stage mainstage)
        Transitions the scene to a slideshow view of the album. Produces error alert if the album is currently empty.
        Parameters:
        mainstage - the main stage

      • handleReturnButton

        private void handleReturnButton(javafx.stage.Stage mainstage)
        Transitions the scene back to the album summary list for the specified user.
        Parameters:
        mainstage - the main stage
